title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Marmolada Glacier, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Nir Israeli, “This picture is from the Sella Ronda Clockwise MTB 60 KM tour, 450M assent  4000M descent in the Dolomites. The mountain in front of me is the Marmolada Glacier.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Marmolada Glacier, Italy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
